009package imagingbook.common.filter.examples;
010
011import imagingbook.common.filter.generic.GenericFilterVector;
012import imagingbook.common.image.PixelPack;
013
014public class ExampleFilter3x3Vector extends GenericFilterVector {
015
016        private final static float[][] H = {
017                        {1, 2, 1},
018                        {2, 4, 2},
019                        {1, 2, 1}};
020        
021        private final static int width = 3;
022        private final static int height = 3;
023        private final static int xc = 1;
024        private final static int yc = 1;
025        private final static float s = 16;
026        
027        @Override
028        protected float[] doPixel(PixelPack pack, int u, int v) {
029                int depth = pack.getDepth();
030                float[] sum = new float[depth];
031                for (int j = 0; j < height; j++) {
032                        int vj = v + j - yc;
033                        for (int i = 0; i < width; i++) {
034                                int ui = u + i - xc;
035                                float[] p = pack.getPix(ui, vj);
036                                for (int k = 0; k < depth; k++) {
037                                        sum[k] = sum[k] + (p[k] * H[i][j]) / s;
038                                }
039                        }
040                }
041                return sum;
042        }
043
044}
